title: FS:T210 Series 6 Fred Toney and Reed Winchester

posts.post_title: FS:T210 Series 6 Fred Toney and Reed Winchester
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone I have two different T210 6 cards for sale.  The first is a ungraded Fred Toney card.  This is a very tough card I am asking $150.00 for it. The second is a low grade SGC 10 Reed with back damage I am asking 30.00 for.  I prefer paypal for payment.  If interested message me at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]  Scans are below Thanks

Tony

Toney has been sold Thanks John.

Reed still up for grabs.

Tony
